title: Mass brawl outside a nightclub in Sydney's Kings Cross leaves five police officers injured
text:
Five police officers have been taken to hospital as riot officers were called in to break up a large brawl outside a night club in Kings Cross.

Seven people are in custody after the fight erupted outside the venue at Bayswater Rd, Potts Point, on Saturday night.

Police were called about 11.20pm to reports of a disturbance breaking out after a man was removed from the hotel.

Police were called about 11.20pm to reports of a disturbance breaking out after a man was removed from the hotel

Four officers suffered suspected head injuries and a fifth had an injured arm, police said.

Paramedics treated several people who were sprayed with pepper spray.

The incident is under investigation.

Seven people are in custody after the fight erupted outside the venue at Bayswater Rd, Potts Point, on Saturday night
description: Five police officers have been taken to hospital as riot officers were called in to break up a large brawl outside an inner Sydney hotel.
